verbose_text: Reduction in the fasting and the postprandial blood sugar levels with leaves of insulin plant was comparable with that obtained with Glibenclamide 500 mug/kg at 250 mg/kg and 500 mg/kg of powdered leaves of the insulin plant (Costus igeus) [P < 0.01, Kruskal-Wallis test (H)] [Figures XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG, Tables XREF_TABLE and XREF_TABLE].
